content.detailedDescription: We were riding my harley to a party at cheney reservoir around 8:30pm on or about october 23, 1973, in any case, it was a friday night. we were headed west on 21st street north barely outside of wichita, kansas.  i stopped my bike on a dirt road intersection to relieve myself. i was a flight-line mechanic at the cessna aircraft factory at mid continent airport (ict) in wichita, and a student pilot, so i was watching incoming planes. that night there must have been a slight south wind, because the aircraft were headed south to land on runway 19 left. donna and i saw an orange ball just sitting there, seemingly in the way, or the approach path to land. we both watched for a few moments and shrugged it off.  as i swung a leg over the seat to start the sportster donna waited to get on until i kickstarted the bike. she then told me that as she watched me start it, it got darker around me, as if the ufo had somehow lit the area around us, as if watching us. again, we shrugged it off and rode on toward the party, not knowing we would never get to that party. as we continued down the two lane blacktop, we looked over our shoulders to the east, and it kept the same relative position to us.  it  was following us. to make a long story short, the ordeal lasted until we thought it was midnight, it was three am.  i could think a question, and it would move west for yes, east for no, and north and south if it didn't understand or want to answer. a few days later, a local radio station,keyn, had a call in talk show on ufo's.  a woman from el dorado,ks. called in and reported that she had had almost the exact same experience a few days before we did, but we did not hear her storty until after we had also experienced the same self-explanitory telepathic  orange sphere. (with at least one three foot smaller "scout" ufo. it changed our lives. hers for the worse, and i have had some terrible nightmares over the years, but i feel lucky to have had the experience. one question it answered positivly, was that i would see  it again someday. since donna and i grew up together, and i knew she was our senior valedictorian, and i was the senior class president, we had some credibility, but did not want to tell anyone. i am now on disability and plan to write a book about the whole story.  i thought the ufo was here for her, due to her high i.Q., until about five years ago when we got together for the first time in years, when she told me she knew all along that it was here for me. i guess i am the one that it suggested telepathy to and with. we both always sort of doubted what happened, a sort of denial, but every few years we go out to eat and see a movie, but the conversation inevitably ends up with us reliving that night and talking for hours about it. i am sending this report to mufon now because i recently had cancer and want to tell it before i die. i'm cancer free now, but i had a taste of mortality, and it sucks.
content.summary: Girlfriend and myself on motorcycle observed ufo observing us. had telepathic communication for hours. three foot diameter smaller orb followed 500' behind us. orange with other colored lights circling it on larger ufo.

content.detailedDescription: We were walking home from tesco when we saw some strange light at the top of roundball hill it was a blueish colour we thought it was just a torch light but then it shoot up and hovered for a while then it split into two and circled the top of the hill and clashed back together and pulsated an orange colour then shot straight up out of sight.
content.summary: Bright lights rounball hill, honiton

content.detailedDescription: My daughter and i were outside walking to our car in a mountainous neighborhood.  it was a bright and clear night with a full moon (or very close to it),and some clouds.  my daughter looking up to admire the clouds in the light saw a satellite and pointed.  then, i looked up as well and then she exclaimed "whoa! there are a whole bunch of them!" we started counting as they passed over, and in my range of site, i counted 12 in very close proximity.  they were all moving at the same speed and were at somewhat staggared distances apart from each other. (not evenly spaced).
content.summary: A dozen or more satellite -looking objects all in the same proximity moving from south to north

content.detailedDescription: In the fall winter of 1973 - 1974 i drempt of flying in a triangular shaped craft. i even drew a picture of it the next day. this was before anyone knew about the stealth program and the stealth aircraft. i flew over the north west. there were very tall red wood trees and mountains.T was flown down very close to the tree tops and the mountains.     i could see the consol and i stood behind the pilots seat, and i believe i even sat in the pilots seat. i do remember seeing dials and the control panel, but could not draw them then, maybe under hypnosis.(???) i do not remember seeing any other individuals in the craft with me. but i know they were there. the craft from new zeland resembles the craft that i rode in. case # 21773  log #nz 202042010-0006 gmt city auckland country nz long: 174.767 lat:-36.867 shape triangle. 1) i was in the cockpitof the craft 2) i awoke to bestanding in the cockpit watching the view below me and around me 3) i felt it was not anything i had ever seen before, or really ever expected to see. 4)it flew like a regular aircraft,but it seemed to manover quite quickly and easily to the touch as it flew over the trees and the mountains. it almost seemed to glide reather than fly, unlike any other aircraft i have been in or have seen on tv. 5) it was quite exciting, fascinating. i did not have to hold on during the extream turns either right or left, or the climbs or descents of the craft. the scenery was breathtaking and the experience was augh inspiring. 6) i awoke the next morning and carried on with my normal activities, i got my husband off to work, my children off to school, then this event just would not leave my mind. so i sat down and begsn to draw the craft.  everyone else in the home was asleep and has no knowledge of my experience. 1974 after this event i was expecting my son and gave birth in march, 1974. he was dramaticly effected by something.He would awake at night crying and visably shaking and it would take me hours to get him to calm down. he drempt of a ball chasing him. or of a mash potato substance falling from the sky on the photocarpous trees at the end of the house. (east side) he would awake outside, in his dreams.
content.summary: In the fall/winter of 1973-1974 i dreamt of flying in a triangular shaped craft.

content.detailedDescription: We were driving from texas to florida for vacation.  my dad was driving the car and woke me up in the back seat asking me what i thought this could be?  my mother was in the passenger seat.  i we continued to look we all agreed that maybe it was a water tower but that wasn't adding up.  all of a sudden it shot across over a lake clear as day and just hovered.  i knew it wasn't from earth instantly.  i just kept saying [cms/tg/pd].  my parents didn't say anything about the language i was using since they were also completely startled.  it was as it was looking right back at us.  i don't remember seeing any light around it but it was a disc shaped object.  i all distinctly remember is how it took off.  i remember something coming out of it as it exited the atmosphere.  it was like a spark of some sort and then it vanished.  it was a truly amazing and life changing experience that i will never forget.  i have told many people this story in which they believe me but can never truly understand the affect of seeing one for themselves.  i always bring it up to my parents and we all know what we saw but know we are not alone and that is all.  i had a good minute to a minute and a half looking at this so i'm 100% on what i saw.  i always am looking up in the sky looking for another craft as my wife and i are driving.  i really want her to get to see what i saw when i was a child.  it is a life changing experience to say the least.  i'm obsessed with ufo's and always have been after this moment!
content.summary: It was a disc shaped object hovering over a lake charles casino bright as day.

content.detailedDescription:
I stepped out onto my balcony and noticed a bright object tracking from east to west in the northern sky. i noticed a steady, fairly bright light, at first i thought it was a sattelite but it was too low and too slow. i watched it for approx 1 minute before it split into a total of 4 objects. the 3 new objects moved at the same speed, diverged from the primary at equal angles and slowly grew farther apart from the first object seen. this continued for approximatly 1 minute and all 4 lights diappeared spontaneously. they did not speed up, flicker, turn, just were gone, all at the same time. i did not see any navigation lights, hear any engine noises. 

this is the first time i've ever reported anything. this whole thing was just plain strange. in the past i've worked as a professional pilot and as an air traffic controller, i'm very used to looking at aircraft, this was definitly different.
content.summary: Saw a steady light, moving, split into 4 steady lights. disappeared at same time.

content.detailedDescription: I see objects almost every single night i do not know what they are i have had several different encounters once it was two bright lights one just floated in the air and another one came out of no where and flew right over my house very fast and stopped in  mid air made no sound there was an air craft also that had one light in the back that stayed on and one on each side that took turns flashing with one in the front it flew right over my house it was not very high and made no sound at all i seen it close up twice i see these light's every single night when the sky is clear i have seen so much ufo's this year and i have never seen any before in my life! i just wish some people who are interested in this phenomemon would come and see for urself! im not sure what they are im not saying i'v seen aliens but i'm saying i see ufo's every time the sky is clear the people i tell all shrug it off for a reason i do not understand , mabye fear or maybe they just do not have the mental capacity to fathom such an occurance! i guarantee you will see these objects if you visited this little reserve in the middle of canada, it is in the bush basicly in the middle of no where! i have been facinated every since and i look up everything i can about the topic that is how i found this site, i'v seen your shows on tv where you people go to investigate these sightings so please listen close if you want to see a ufo with your own eye's visit this reserve i guarntee that you will see these objects because they are out here every single night! i have seen em so much that i am used to it!
content.summary: Moving bright light

content.detailedDescription: At 2-4-2010, 18:37 (summer time, brasilia) i saw this "v" shaped object close to the horizon, in rio de janeiro, brazil. i took a picture of the beautiful sunset from the window of my home office, and minutes later, appeared what a thought to be a smoke and vapor from a plane at high altitude. but the object traveled very fast (angular velocity from my vantage point) and didn't leave anything behind, but moved like a whole thing (different from meteorites i observed on similar conditions years ago. i just had time to take two shots before it disappear behind the mountain. i changed the sensibility of the camera in some seconds between them. it didn't look to me, exactly like a plane, meteorite, cloud, or planet, so i have no explanation.
content.summary: Observation of an apparently gaseous v shaped object moving close to the sunset.
content.locationName: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro

content.detailedDescription: I took these pictures through a telescope with a digital camera. they are pixilated because i had to zoom in with a computer. they appear as dots on the origional, included, and are the same object appearing as different colors when the frame exposed and caught the certain color. notice the plasma around them. enjoy.
content.summary: Multi-colored ufo

content.detailedDescription: Please contact max mitchell tn chief investigator for description of events.
content.summary: Alien abductions and possible implant

content.detailedDescription:
This picture was captured 3 feb 2010, 3:55:41pm above my house roof.  it is invisible & shaped  like a triangle.
please add this attached picture to case 18817 file (long term visitation). more details from: http://ufo-spacelife.Blogspot.Com/
content.summary: Picture of triangle ufo

content.detailedDescription: Was about 5-7 years old,bad thunderstorm outside house,everyone was either asleep or downstairs watching thunder,power was lost.A strange and deep blue light came in from every window.Was upstairs,and noticed some old toy figurines moving by themselves,i was a child,so i thought it was amusing,went into bathroom to urinate,small blue headed being with rod in hand standing  by door watching me urinate.I remember his face was sharp looking like his nose was very long or his face was curved in an angle from the nose.Eyes were slanted but not bug eyed.Ball on rod began to glow orange then yellow.And i remember no more.Have had dreams about the incident and this includes seeing a naked blond women on a metal bed,with a tall being standing over her.Head of being was elongated and the being floated,did not walk.Did not want me there.Moved me to another room.Memory lapse and i have no more recollection.My experience is very mixed up,have had many other sightings.
content.summary: Bright blue light surronded house,childrens toys began to move by themselves.Contact was made but brief

content.detailedDescription:
We were driving east on 13 mile road, just coming into the city of sparta.  my boyfriend and i saw a light at the same time.  it appeared to be moving north just above the trees.  it abruptly turned (way too quickly for a plane and without banking at all) and moved south back the way it had come.  we lost sight of it behind the buildings and trees.  i kept a look out for anything once we were driving in an open area.  i noticed two planes that seemed to be slowly circling above sparta, but nothing else.  whatever it was, it was lower to the ground than a plane normally flies.

i would have dismissed this event if not for the fact that i saw a similar object about a mile west of this location in 1996.
content.summary: Bright light/orb

content.detailedDescription: I smoke cigarettes outside where i often star gaze. on the aforementioned night i was watching a sattelite cross the sky when it made a 90 degree turn and with a flash accelerated and then zoomed away almost instantly
content.summary: Am avid sky watcher and track satellites all the time but this one time it made 90 degree turn and accerated.

content.detailedDescription: I was out in my garden looking up to roundball hill (clearly visible over my fence) when i saw a blue light come down on it at slow speed i was baffled for a minute an just assumed it was a chinese lantern or firework but then it shoot back up and split into two on was more of a green colour they then hovered there for about 3 minutes then started circling then both clashed and they shoot straight up and that's when they vanished.
content.summary: Rounball hill honiton strange lights and movemen

content.detailedDescription: Arriving home from a trip to santa maria, my brother and i were admiring the stars in an unusually clear sky.  the location of his home, being well away from the city made for very little or no light pollution so we could even see the billowy dust lane of the milky way.  my brother told me to look just to the right and above the constellation orion because he had seen a flash there.  sure enough, the next time it flashed i saw it as well.  a few seconds later there was a third flash.  these flashes were no brighter than the stars in orion, with the intensity seeming to vary somewhat each time. the color seem to vary each time as well.  i detected amber, green, blue and a grayish white at various times during this sighting.  my brother began counting between flashes, "one-thousand, two-thousand, three-thousand..." we found that the flashes were almost exactly ten seconds apart.  after many flashes i detected that the position of the flash was now changing slightly with each flash. over the course of one half hour the flash moved from a position directly in line with the three stars in orion's sword, above and to the right of orion's belt to a position still above but to the left of orion.  by this time, the brightness of the flashes was quite dim, although they were definitely still detectable. we then carried our stuff into the house, coming out about a half hour later to check on the anomaly, but the flashing was no longer goin on.
content.summary: Continuous single flashes every ten seconds near the constellation orion lasting at least 30 minutes.

content.detailedDescription: My dad and i were in the car, on park dr. and sunset blvd., heading to chick'fil'a to grab some dinner. then, my dad said "look, right there!" and he pointed to a little white dot in the sky, and it was bright. it kinda looked like the north star, but brighter and bigger. then, after about a second passed, it got really big and really bright, and then a really bright glow formed around it, and then it disappeared. it was big, white, and bright. we looked around in the sky, but we couldn't see it. he said that something told him to look that direction, then he saw it and pointed it out to me. he thought that it was a helicopter with a searchlight or something, but it disappeared. the object didn't move, it just stayed there and got brighter and bigger.
content.summary: Big, white, bright, glow

content.detailedDescription: Call me
content.summary: Biggest thing i have ever seen, that is constructed

content.detailedDescription:
I was at allison transmission on 10th street walking toward the east around 10:30 am and i noticed a light ball off in the distance in front of me which i've seen many times before. i stopped to look around and to look for anything unusual and when i looked almost straight up i noticed a colored ring or semi-circle right above me. 
i could see what looked like some type of holographic image in it or above it but couldn't make it out at the time because it was so bright out. i took several photos of the object and kept walking as i was working at the time and needed to go inside the building.
when looking at the photos later and enhancing the brightness and contrast levels i could clearly see some holographic images.
my first thoughts were that this image was from the hand of god and i had been given a message to share. what the message is i am unsure of but it seems important considering everything that is happening in the world today so i am putting it out there for all to see.
the first photo is unedited with the brightness and contrast adjusted to enhance the image.
the second photo is the raw photo directly off the sd card with no adjustments.
content.summary: Refracted ring or disc appears with holographic images.

content.detailedDescription: Moon became differnt colors with outer right part with red orange beam likemoon wobled, then it fell star beside it also left then returned then disapered, i belive it was a fake mmon 2 other people witnes .Earlier that night there was a odd star it kept turning colors,so me and the family decided to drive to general dynamics, there have lots of strange stuff there, it a government place, it supposed to be closed we came homme my son shannon going across street started yelling i see a beam shooting out of the moon. i thought it was a sign from god
content.summary: Moon become differnt colors with outer right  with red orange beam, moon wobled, then it

content.detailedDescription:
I am a pilot, fairly scientific and very techically inclined. the most unexplained phenomena i have ever observed follows. at the time, i was about 17yo and had been flying hang gliders for
about 5 years, was expert in meteorology, as well as very observant and knowledgeable about sky
conditions. it was a very clear day, sometime between around 10:30am to perhaps 13:00, gauging from the southern altitude of the sun.
there were no cirrus clouds or any clouds of any type, and the sky was a high pressury pale blue, not bright blue, although it was quite bright. i was indoors perhaps watching tv.
early in the summer, sometime around 1976-77, my mom called me into our living room which had a large picture window on a second story with a clear view of the northern sky. i am not sure why, but she had noticed some objects (about 5?-never actually counted) that appeared fairly small to the eye at a range of what appeared to be 5-15 miles and an altitude of about 3-5,000 feet at about nnw about 5" at arms length above the horizon. at first they appeared to be birds, because they were 'darting' about. but after watching for a minute or two, it was baffling because they were not moving in any pattern any bird could or would fly. i would estimate the objects to be possibly the size of a medium size tv(difficult to estimate), but certainly larger than seagulls. watching further, there appeared to be greyish, and metallic qualities to them. keep in mind this was over 30 years ago, but i remember it fairly clearly. i cannot remember if i actually saw reflected 'glints' from sunlight, but the appearance at the great distance was that of metal. as i recall, it appeared to be like crumpled balls of aluminum foil, but not as shiny. the distance, altitude, shape and composition was difficult to ascertain, being at some altitude in the sky with no close reference to gauge by. i do not believe they were seagulls, because that was my first impression, but there movement was far too erratic to be seagulls, and they seemed to be solid with no evidence of wings, as well as motion that seagulls could simply not accomplish.
but the pattern of movement was jerky and sometimes circular, initially suggesting birds. but further observation showed the motions to be quite unnatural. being a pilot, i considered perhaps that it was a dust devil at altitude with debris picked up from the ground. but, i dismissed this with the irregular motion which was sometimes quite linear, and sometimes with fairly high accelleration, immediately changing to a circular arc both in horizontal and up and down directions. i have seen thousands of dust devils, and many, many debris objects caught in dust devils, but the objects would move horizontally, and sometimes upwards diagonally, and sometimes in curved motions, from my vantage point several hundred feet in any direction, an possibly if my distance estimate is correct up to 1000' laterally; the motion was unnatural in that the vertical and horizontal motions were of fairly high and incredible (way beyond a seagull or debris) accelerations, beyond what a bird could accomplish and sometimes with sharp angular vector changes, which would suggest a significant direct force, but these motions were confined to an 'area' where the multiple objects stayed within a rough group, but with no apparent connectedness, except that they appeared similar and none departed from the 'group'. they also appeared to remain at a fixed altitude and did not rise or descend, but occupied an area about the size of the tip of your little finger at arm's length.
there seemed to be enough resolution that there were no wings, as that of birds observed, but that the objects were solid bodies with no moving parts, and appeared to be metal, but the shape was undeterminable. in conclusion, having observed thousands of aircraft, dust devils, birds and other things, i still cannot determine what the objects were. we discussed what we were seeing, and because it was indeterminate and difficult to focus at the distance, we became bored and stopped watching at some point. looking again in few minutes, i was unable to spot the objects again. at the distance, unless you had it pointed out to you, you would not have noticed on casual observation, because of the fairly small size against the sky. the key points are that there were multiple objects (5-9?),
the motion of the objects was very irregular, but confined to one area, and their motion had sharp changes in velocity and acceleration, and appeared metallic.
i observed the objects in detail, but due to the distance, i am still puzzled as to what we observed. my mom passed away, so she can not offer testimony. i know that i definitely observed something, and any conceivable explanation in my mind does not satisfy my observation.
i have not had a reputable avenue for reporting this observation, so now i submit it to your independent database of observations.
see attached sketch diagram..
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Metallic objects randomly jerking around range ~15mi alt ~4-6,000ft

content.detailedDescription:
This report is being submitted by oklahoma state director, marilyn carlson for the witness.  he contacted sd by phone.

witness saw a bright light in the night sky while he was outside taking a smoke break.  at first thought it might be an airplane, but it was silent and glided along the sky and had no other flashing lights or colored lights.  it was very bright white star like appearing.  he could not tell the shape due to the brilliance of the light.  he watched for about 15 minutes and it slowly disappeared.  a military jet flew overhead almost immediately after the light disappeared.  wife also saw the object.
content.summary: Bright star like silent object flew overhead.

content.detailedDescription:
my husband and i had just pulled into mcdonalds parking lot and stopped the car. i looked up and directly in front of us was a petsmart. right over the top of petsmart i saw three really bright white lights. they were very low and seemed to be sitting still at first. i thought maybe it was just a very low airplane coming straight and that's why it seemed to be moving slow.  

 then i could tell it was getting closer, and i even made the comment to my husband, "if thats an airplane it's awfully low."  i had looked at the clock and it said exactly 8:45. my husband i both sat and watched it and it was taking forever for it to get to us, considering it was so close to begin with...I looked back at the clock and it was 8:48 and was just getting to be almost directly over our car. my husband got out and went on inside the store (he said he thought it was strange, but he's not really interested in this kind of thing) and i sat in the car and still watched it. i rolled down the windows of the car and there was no sound at all...Even though it almost directly above the car and i could tell at this point that it was a black triangle shaped object. it was just hovering...Not making a sound, no engine noise or anything. it was really eerie to watch it just gliding along completely silent. it was still moving really slowly and as it banked (sort of like the jets do in the air shows) and got further away, i looked at the clock again and it was 8:51.  i watched it till it got far enough away that it was hard to see. it was 8:58 whenever i stopped watching. 

 i had my cell phone with me and wanted to take a picture of it, but for one, i've never taken a picture with my cell phone and didn't want to try at that moment to figure it out. also, i was in total awe of this thing. it was so pretty and so huge. i really didn't want to stop watching it, and except for glancing at the clock a few times, i just wanted to keep watching...When it 'banked' to turn it was incredible. it was just gliding along completely silent...My husband estimated it to be no more than 300 feet in the air.
content.summary: Black triangle with white lights

content.detailedDescription: I left out the photo of the chemtrails i submitted.  here it is.
content.summary: Dulce nm chemtrails.

content.detailedDescription:
On february 2, 2010, at approximately 8:05pm, i was driving south on louisiana state highway 89 at glaser drive, just south of la hwy 182 near youngsville, louisiana (70592), when i saw what at first appeared to be a radio tower beacon.  

knowing that there are no towers in the area, i paid close attention to the object.  this was when i realized that the object was moving, in a ssw direction.  the object first appeared to be glowing, but after a closer look, it seemed to be aflame.  

it did not appear to be moving quickly, and i did not see it leaving a trail.  i thought that it was an emergency flare, but i think that a flare is more of a glow than a flame, and this was definitely a flame.

the object seemed to be about 60 degrees up from the horizon when i first spotted it, and directly ahead of me (90 degrees) when i lost sight of it (or at the point it flamed out).  i hope that i am using the right terminology here. it seemed to have lost some elevation as it moved away from me, but without knowing the altitude of the object, there is no way to know how much elevation was lost.  

the object either flamed out or moved behind clouds at approximately 8:09 pm.  after arriving home, i called 911, but they had received no other reports of the object.

i have attached a video that i took towards the end of the sighting.   it is very faint, but look for a dim light toward the center of the screen
content.summary: "flaming" object falling from sky at an angle

content.detailedDescription: Me and my wife had just sent the kids out the door, to catch the school bus @ their grandfathers, an me and my wife had 2 hours before we had to be anywhere, she went to the restroom only a few minutes after the kids left, i looked at the clock to confirm our time, and time had gone, we had to leave immediately to get to where we was going. later that day we thought maybe we had made a mistake, but the kids came in and said, (did yall see the ufo this morning in the sky?)that got us to thinking about it a little more, all this happened about 2 years ago, and since we wondered if it was just in our heads, about a week after that my dad told my wife he had seen a strange craft in the sky, but later that day when i got home, he could not recall seeing anything. about 3 or 4 months ago we were coming home late a night, when we turned into our long driveway, we seen bright lights like a hellicopter at the end of our drive, and in front of my dads front yard, as we sped towards it, it flopped left and right like nothing i had ever seen through the woods at tree top level, towards a main highway, i also noticed as we got closer and it was leaving, that it did not have lights like a hellicopter, more like a circling light that went around it, i could not tell the shape though, and as time went by we just forgot about it. it seems like the more you wait and not tell anyone, the easier it is to think maybe you really didnt see anything. if i could afford it, me and my wife would be hypnotized just to see if anything was to it. but with our jobs it would not pay for this info. to be released. hope you can answer some of the questions...Thanks
content.summary: Me and my spouse loss of time. kids seen strange object in sky the same day.

content.detailedDescription: I was letting my dog outside in the backyard and saw five amber lights in a triangle formation heading north slowly. after a while they flickered out. i see these lights several times over a course of a year and have been for about 8 years now. they always head north to northeast. it has become no big deal since people here see them often. they are definetly not commercial aircraft of any kind.
content.summary: Five amber lights in a triangle shape moving north, northeast

content.detailedDescription: Please see attached power point slide. there were two witnesses to this event. sorry it has taken me so long to report.
content.summary: Night time ufo sighting over terre haute, in in 1989 by 2 known witnesses.

content.detailedDescription: While eating mcdonalds on the roof of the multistorey carpark at brighton marina, a friend and i observed an orange sphere come from over the horizon, to the west, and travel in an easterly direction along the line of the coast. as it moved towards us it seemed to change to a south easterly heading and move out to sea. as it grew fainter another sphere appeared from the west and followed the same course. over a 25 minute period we observed 5 spheres do this and another 3 came directly overhead, from the north, heading in a south, south easterly direction and also heading out to approximately the same area of the sea. the 3 that came directly overhead made no sound and seemed to be at about the same height as a light aircraft although as it was dark it is hard to be precise. friends i have told have dismissed these objects as chinese lanterns but i do not believe this for 2 reasons: firstly, at one point i observed one of the spheres overtake another slower moving one. if these were lanterns drifting in the wind, how could one be moving so much faster than another? and secondly, the 3 that came from the north originated from a completely different direction, many many miles away from the 5 that came from the west and were travelling on a different bearing also. surely this would not happen if they were drifting in the wind? from what i saw, i believe these objects were travelling under their own power and all seemed to be heading out to the same area of the sea where they grew fainter and eventually dissapeared from view. before this experience i had no particular interest in ufo's but what i saw felt 'other worldly' and i only regret i didnt have a camera to capture it.
content.summary: 8 orange orbs

content.detailedDescription: I was headed for bible study on firetower road on this night.This road has very little traffic,especially at night.After driving about 2 miles,i noticed a red-orange cylinder shaped object about 25 degrees above the horizon to the north.It was slowly moving in a westerly direction.Trees passing by often obscured my vision of the object.When i got to a point where i could see the object clearly,i had an idea.I stopped the truck and flashed my headlights on and off.Suddenly the object winked out and quickly came on again.I flashed my lights again and once more i got the same result.The object seemed to be about 4 miles away.I had to stop observing the object because i was about to be late for bible study.Two weeks later,which is tonight,i went to bible study,but i didn't see anything unusual in the sky.We didn't have a meeting last tuesday night.
content.summary: A red-orange cylinder in the northern night sky
